bookmark.add_description: Enter the details of the bookmark you want to add.
bookmark.title: Title
bookmark.edit_description: Make changes to your bookmark here. Click save when you're done.
bookmark.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this bookmark?

collection.enter_new_name: Enter a new name for this collection
collection.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this collection and all its bookmarks? This action cannot be undone.

tag.enter_new_name: Enter a new name for this tag
tag.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this tag?
tag.confirm_delete_with_bookmarks: Are you sure you want to delete this tag? All bookmarks using this tag ({{count}}) will no longer have this tag. This action cannot be undone.

settings.title: Settings
settings.import_description: Upload a CSV file exported from Raindrop.io to import your bookmarks.
settings.import_error_invalid_file: Please select a valid CSV file.
settings.import_error_token: CSRF token not found. Please refresh the page.

api_token.title: API Token
api_token.description: Generate an API token to access your bookmarks via the API. Keep this token secret.
api_token.no_token: You don't have an API token yet. Generate one to start using the API.
api_token.revoke_confirm: Are you sure you want to revoke this token? You will need to generate a new one to use the API again.
